actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

House Committee on Energy and Commerce Discharged by Suspension of Rules.
House Committee on Science and Technology Discharged by Suspension of Rules.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the advancement of science and technology in the communications and electronics industry is vital to the needs of America.

summary.text: Expresses the resolve of the Congress: (1) to take a leading role in increasing awareness of the importance of maintaining the scientific and technological superiority of the United States in the area of electronics and communications; and (2) to encourage the establishment of a national center dedicated to such area.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the advancement of science and technology in the communications and electronics industry is vital to the needs of America.
